text: The Neon Demon is a 2016 American Belgian French Danish psychological horror movie directed by Nicolas Winding Refn and starring Elle Fanning, Karl Glusman, Jena Malone, Desmond Harrington, Christina Hendricks, Keanu Reeves, Bella Heathcote. It was distributed by Amazon Studios. ==Other websites== * * Category:2016 horror movies Category:2016 LGBT movies Category:American horror movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Belgian LGBT movies Category:Belgian horror movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:French horror movies Category:Danish LGBT movies Category:Danish horror movies Category:Movies directed by Nicolas Winding Refn Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Neon Demon
